response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $1,500,000 to me. Considering its immense worth to you, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure seamless integration into your business processes. I look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your operations and boost your bottom line. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 1200000}
